target.text: Integrating with iChain

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Assure that the iChain proxy's port number matches the Novell Teaming/Liferay port number. If you have configured Novell Teaming to run on port 8080, the iChain proxy should also use port 8080. If the port numbers differ, you must set the Listen Port setting in the Network information window when you run the installer.

target.name: Step
target.text: Assure that the iChain proxy's port number matches the Novell Teaming/Liferay port number. If you have configured Novell Teaming to run on port 8080, the iChain proxy should also use port 8080. If the port numbers differ, you must set the Listen Port setting in the Network information window when you run the installer.

target.name: Step
target.text: In iChain configuration window of the installer, select the Enable iChain option, set the Logoff URL setting to the log-off URL provided by the iChain proxy server, and set the iChain Proxy setting to the IP address of the iChain proxy server.

target.name: Step
target.text: Finish running the installer's New Installation or Reconfiguration. See "Running the Installer" on page 25.
